name: Avocadventure
description:
In the distant Veggiland, a once calm and peaceful place, weird things are happening. Vegetables citizens going missing, only to come back a couple of days later, corrupted and evil. Even the loved king, KingCumber, has fallen to that evil.

Play as a young avocado, determined to find out what happened and stop the madness. Fight evil veggies, talk to citizens, buy powerups, and fight epic bosses! Will you manage to save Veggiland? Only one way to find out!
